item.description:
a/k/a "hot hookups" lol...

If you've never tried speed dating before, here's your opportunity...it's a fun way to meet new members, of the opposite sex, in a comfortable setting, and an excellent alternative to internet dating, as at least you meet people face-to-face.

Speedating with suzie…
Otherwise know as hot hookups ;)
Go on up to 12 dates in
one, fun-filled evening!

You've heard about this exciting, new trend on popular talk-shows and on the news, now it's time to try it...
• No pressure, no rejection
• Fun, upscale way to date
• Easy going “night club” scene
• Up to 12, 7-minute speed dates

Where:
“48 Below”
55 Water Street
In Quaint downtown Exeter, NH

When:
November 10, 2010
Ages 45-57 at 6:30
Ages 33-45 at 8:30
(try and get there a little early to register and/or get a little liquid courage ;)

(plenty of parking, free public parking across the street, look for the marquis sign
the IOCA room)
Cost is $20 and make check out to Susan Tisbert and mail to me at:
PO BOX 793
PELHAM, NH 03076 (to reserve your spot)

YOU MUST INCLUDE YOUR NAME, PHONE NUMBER (IN CASE OF WEATHER CANCELLATION),
EMAIL ADDRESS, AND AGE GROUP/TIME YOU WILL BE ATTENDING
(and I'm not the age police)

BUT YOU MUST PREREGISTER AND PAY, TO ATTEND, SO I HAVE AN EVEN #, AND SO I KNOW
WHO'S COMING ;)

COME EARLY FOR PIZZA/BURGER ETC. FROM BAR MENU, CLUB OPENS AT 6PM, BUT I'LL ASK ABOUT THEM OPENING/SERVING FOR 5:30, FOR THOSE OF YOU COMING FROM WORK AND ATTENDING THE EARLIER PARTY. (AND DON’T FORGET YOU’VE GOT THE FOLLOWING DAY/VETERAN’S DAY OFF ;)

For info you can write to me at stisbert@yahoo.com
item.how_to_find_us: we'll be in the downstairs lounge

group.name: The Portsmouth "and beyond" Nite Out Meetup Group

item.name: speed dating in Exeter, NH!
